name: Carousel
description: A horizontal scrollable container for navigating between multiple items. Supports multiple navigation methods including drag, keyboard, and autoplay functionality.

props.name: defaultActiveIndex
props.description: The initial page to display in uncontrolled mode

props.name: activeIndex
props.description: The value of the currently active page

props.name: onActiveIndexChange
props.description: Callback to notify a page change

props.name: circular
props.description: Circular enables the carousel to loop back around on navigation past trailing index

props.name: groupSize
props.description: Controls the number of carousel cards per navigation element

props.name: draggable
props.description: Enables drag to scroll on carousel items

props.name: whitespace
props.description: Adds whitespace to start/end so that 'align' prop is always respected for current index

props.name: motion
props.description: Sets motion type as either 'slide' or 'fade'

props.name: announcement
props.description: Localizes the string used to announce carousel page changes

props.name: autoplayInterval
props.description: Choose a delay between autoplay transitions in milliseconds

props.name: nav
props.description: The direction this button will navigate

subComponents.name: CarouselCard
subComponents.description: A single item/slide within the carousel

props.name: children
props.description: The content to display in the card

subComponents.name: CarouselNav
subComponents.description: Navigation container for carousel pagination buttons

props.name: children
props.description: Navigation buttons or custom navigation content

subComponents.name: CarouselNavButton
subComponents.description: Individual navigation button for specific carousel slide

props.name: value
props.description: The index of the slide this button navigates to

subComponents.name: CarouselViewport
subComponents.description: Viewport container for the carousel content

props.name: children
props.description: Carousel content to be displayed in viewport
